SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.google.code.ssm.api
Annotation Type ReadThroughMultiCacheOption

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface ReadThroughMultiCacheOption

Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Jakub Bia≈Çek

Optional Element Summary
 boolean addNullsToCache
          If true and generateKeysFromResult() is true then null value will be added to cache under keys that don't occurred in result list.
 boolean generateKeysFromResult
          If true then objects from result will be added to cache not by concatenating method arguments annotated by ParameterValueKeyProvider but invoking CacheKeyMethod or toString() on each object in result list.
 boolean skipNullsInResult
          If true then null values from cache are not added to result list.
 

generateKeysFromResult

public abstract boolean generateKeysFromResult
If true then objects from result will be added to cache not by concatenating method arguments annotated by ParameterValueKeyProvider but invoking CacheKeyMethod or toString() on each object in result list. So order of the IDs on collection argument don't have to correspond the order of elements in result list. It can increase performance increasing amount of objects added to cache if number of IDs in collection method argument is different than number of objects in result list.

Default:
false

addNullsToCache

public abstract boolean addNullsToCache
If true and generateKeysFromResult() is true then null value will be added to cache under keys that don't occurred in result list. If true and result from annotated method is null then null will be add to all keys regardless of generateKeysFromResult() value.

Default:
false

skipNullsInResult

public abstract boolean skipNullsInResult
If true then null values from cache are not added to result list.

Default:
false
